nodes.text: The Sartran Corporation, also known under the abbreviated name Sartran Corp, was a subsidiary of the InterGalactic Banking Clan that went bankrupt during the Clone Wars.

The Sartran Corporation was first mentioned in the 1988 Star Wars Legends sourcebook Star Wars Campaign Pack. It was established to be canon by "An Old Friend," the fifth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' sixth season, where it was mentioned as the Sartran Corp. The corporation's full name was brought into canon by "An Old Friend"' accompanying episode guide on StarWars.com.
